why_it_matters: Although non-drug methods are often used to treat depression, sometimes antidepressants are needed. Most antidepressants seem to be equally effective, and therefore doctors should decide which ones to give based on people’s previous experience and the likely side-effects. NICE guidance recommends that a generic type of antidepressant called an SSRI should normally be used first.
